tutorial_text.text:
Though lacking a consistent offense in the form of unblockables,

the Shrub can apply damage via posture infliction.



The Shrub can bash with the "$specialBind" keyboard input.



Attacking to a down singing note instead bashes,

which interrupts opponent actions/special attacks, and ability

to block for a short time.



If the opponent has full posture, an attack after a bash will

deal lethal damage.



The Shrub is not defeated upon depleting stamina, but he cannot

perform any maneuvers he does not have enough stamina for.



Passively chip enemy posture by blocking attack flurries,

throw attacks during moments of downtime to stop recovery,

then end with a lethal bash-to-attack once posture reaches full.
